<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quicksilver Mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3319)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=589" />
<trait label="Mutagen" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=808" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=670" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 290 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You become swifter and nimbler but also fragile. 

**Benefit** You gain an item bonus to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) checks, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) checks, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) checks, Reflex saves, and Dexterity-based attack rolls, and you gain the listed status bonus to your Speed. 

**Drawback** You take damage equal to twice your level; you can't recover Hit Points lost in this way by any means while the mutagen lasts. You take a –2 penalty to Fortitude saves.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Price** 4 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus to rolls is +1, the bonus to Speed is +5 feet, and the duration is 1 minute.
